# 1. Lecture 2 Homework

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(AmesHousing)
library(ggplot2)
ames_raw %>%
  group_by(Street) %>%
  summarize(`SalePrice`= mean(`SalePrice`,  na.rm = TRUE),
            `Lot Frontage` = mean(`Lot Frontage`, na.rm = TRUE))

h<-ggplot(data = ames_raw %>%
            group_by(`Lot Shape`),
          aes(x=`Year Built`,
              y=`SalePrice`))
h<- h + geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(`Lot Shape`)))
h
```
